name: RUN (itch) (StarGarnet, castlebbs)
description:
RUN ALIEN RUN! Jump to avoid the obstacles, grab enough coins to go to the next level. If  jump you loose speed, sometimes, just let it GO! Be Careful, there are some traps, and not only in your world! Look Below! This is symmetric, well sometimes not everything is! Try to get through the 3 levels!

Controls

Click [space]  to jump. Click Q to restart or quit.

Credits

StarGarnet: Art and coding

Castlebbs: Coding

Woosis and Zinkenite: Testing

Music by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon | Creative Commons CC BY 4.0

Sound effects: freesound.org
